title: 10 Minute Guided Meditation for Relationships
description:
If any of your relationships are causing stress or sadness, this meditation will offer a miraculous shift in perspective! Press play, close your eyes, and listen to my Meditation for Healing Relationships. In less than 10 minutes, I’ll guide you to release resentment and open your heart to forgiveness. When you open your eyes again, you’ll see your relationship through the lens of love.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

You can get additional relationship meditations and SO much more inside my brand new 14-Day Relationship Challenge! It starts on October 1, and you can sign up for it now. https://bit.ly/3R5TIMS

My latest book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, has more spiritual and therapeutic tips you can use to heal your relationships—including the one you have with yourself. https://bit.ly/3r2vacU

 

Produced by Dear Media.
